title: Cathy Freeman sells Melbourne home for more than $3.475 million
text:
Advertisement

Olympic gold medallist Cathy Freeman has sold her Melbourne home five months after listing the property.

Cathy, 46, who lived there before winning the gold medal at the 2000 Sydney Olympic Games, sold above the asking price of $3.475 million, according to Real Estate.

The contemporary home boasts of five bedrooms, four bathrooms, a garage big enough to fit four cars and a luxury pool.

Golden sale! Olympic gold medallist Cathy Freeman has sold her Melbourne home for over $3.475 million- five months after listing the property

The spacious, light-filled 1034sqm property features floor-to-ceiling windows, three verandas, a balcony and ceiling windows in the luxury bathroom.

The main bedroom in the house is also equipped with a walk-in wardrobe and a glamorous en-suite.

It is moments away from various shopping strips and a short stroll to a convent and the Yarra Valley river.

Sold! The contemporary home boasts of five bedrooms, four bathrooms, a garage big enough to fit four cars and a luxury pool

Modern mansion: The spacious, light-filled 1034sqm property features floor-to-ceiling windows, three verandas, a balcony and ceiling windows in the luxury bathroom

The cliff-side house proved so popular that 180 groups inspected it before it was sold, according to Real Estate.

Cathy bought the property back in 1999 before selling it to vendors in 2006 for $1.75 million.

The vendors have since made some minor changes to its interior, adding bi-folding doors and a deck.

Glamorous: The main bedroom in the house is also equipped with a walk-in wardrobe and a glamorous en-suite

Out with the old! Cathy bought the property back in 1999 before selling it to vendors in 2006 for $1.75 million

The former athlete decided to sell up after reportedly buying a $2.2 million house in Brighton.

Cathy, who has kept a rather low profile in recent years, is married to businessman James Murch.

The pair, who tied the knot in April 2009, share a daughter called Ruby Anne Susie.

Before settling down with her man, she had a relationship with actor Joel Edgerton, 43, before the pair split in 2005.
description: Olympic gold medallist Cathy Freeman has sold her Melbourne home five months after listing the property.
authors: David Wu For Daily Mail Australia
